name: Treader
description:
A minimalist coin runner that enables you to play the way you want. Is the level too short? Make it longer! Level too easy? Make it tougher! You can quickly reset the level when ever you want. Collect coins and make it to the end zone to up your score. Be careful though, once you go past the starting line...something will be chasing you. 

IN-DEVELOPMENT: Adjustable Camera Options and  Mobile Support.
